mention_address: "Pixieland Amusement Park, Windy Grove Cars, Concord, Contra Costa County, California, 94519, United States of America"
attraction_reviewComments: Pixieland has been around forever and was, fortunately rescued and renovated a few years back. It is located in a residential area on the east side of Concord. From Pixieland a... read more
Great for even the youngest, 10 minutes from the hotel, pretty little park with low impact rides. I have taken my daughter ther since she was 4 years old.
We had a great time at Pixieland! We have a three, four, and five year old and every one had a blast. My eight year old was not with us, but she would have loved it too. We did... read more
We took our granddaughter and the rides were just right for a 4 yo, For young kids not as overwhelming as the bigger parks can be.
Great rides for small fries. It is a kick-back kind of place. Easy to get to. Relaxed atmosphere. My kids both loved it. Clean.
